data.name: Bombardment
data.detailed_description:
Bombardment is a Turn Based Strategy (TBS) game where you must advance towards each levels objective.

As the last surviving Archimage you must work towards taking the land back from the evil deity that has invaded and overthrown the council of leaders. Using turn based tactics to seek out and destroy the enemies forces you will be once again bring order and civility back to the land.
